test.common
Class TestGroup

java.lang.Object
  test.common.TestGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TestGroup
extends java.lang.Object
implements jade.util.leap.Serializable

Class representing a group of tests (often related to a given functionality) that have to be executed in sequence and require similar configuration, initialization and clean-up operations. A TestGroup is executed by a TesterAgent.

Version:
$Date: December 2003
Author:
Giovanni Caire - TILAB
See Also:
TesterAgent, Test, Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
TestGroup(java.lang.String filename)
          Creates a TestGroup object including the tests specified in the filename file.
 
Method Summary
protected  java.lang.Object getArgument(java.lang.String name)
          This method retrieves an argument specified at the group level.
protected  void initialize(jade.core.Agent a)
          The developer should override this method to perform initializations common to all tests in the group
protected  java.lang.Object setArgument(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object val)
          Store a group argument so that it will be accessible by tests in the group by means of the getGroupArgument() method of the Test class.
protected  void shutdown(jade.core.Agent a)
          The developer should override this method to perform cleanings common to all tests in the group
 int size()
          Return the number of tests in the TestGroup
 void specifyArgument(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String label)
          Specify mandatory argument for this TestGroup.
 void specifyArgument(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String label, java.lang.String defaultVal)
          Specify an optional argument for this TestGroup.

Constructor Detail

TestGroup

public TestGroup(java.lang.String filename)
Creates a TestGroup object including the tests specified in the filename file.

Method Detail

specifyArgument

public void specifyArgument(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String label,
                            java.lang.String defaultVal)
Specify an optional argument for this TestGroup. If the user does not provide a value for this argument, the default value will be used.

specifyArgument

public void specifyArgument(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String label)
Specify mandatory argument for this TestGroup. The user will always have to provide a value for this argument.

getArgument

protected java.lang.Object getArgument(java.lang.String name)
This method retrieves an argument specified at the group level. Developers may use it from the initialize() method to retrieve arguments inserted through the InsertArgumentsDlg dialog window.

setArgument

protected java.lang.Object setArgument(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.Object val)
Store a group argument so that it will be accessible by tests in the group by means of the getGroupArgument() method of the Test class.

See Also:
Test.getGroupArgument(String)

initialize

protected void initialize(jade.core.Agent a)
                   throws TestException
The developer should override this method to perform initializations common to all tests in the group

Throws:
TestException

shutdown

protected void shutdown(jade.core.Agent a)
The developer should override this method to perform cleanings common to all tests in the group

size

public int size()
Return the number of tests in the TestGroup
